edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager

Class RegistrationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager.RegistrationManager

  • public class RegistrationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class defines Singleton model and behavior for RegistrationManager object. This class controls login/out logic as well as some basic getters for the CourseCatalog and StudentDirectory sorted lists. Inner class defines constructor for Registrar objects.
    Author:
    Nick Garner

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  RegistrationManager.Registrar
      Defines constructor for Registrar User, differentiated from Student User.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearData()
      Resets both courseCatalog and studentDirectory to empty Sorted Lists and removes all data from them.

      Creates a new Registrar user based on field data from registrar.properties file

      Returns true if the logged in student can drop the given course.

      Returns true if the logged in student can enroll in the given course.

      Returns the courseCatalog Sorted List.

      Returns the User object that is currently logged into the system.

      Checks to see if single instance of RegistrationManager has been instantiated and then returns that instance
      StudentDirectory getStudentDirectory()
      Returns the studentDirectory Sorted List.
      private java.lang.String hashPW(java.lang.String pw)
      Helper method to hash passwords for use in comparisons for login.
      boolean login(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String password)
      Checks that the given password matches the stored student password, or if the id is a Registrar id, that the given password matches the Registrar password.
      void logout()
      Ends the session of a Student logged in and returns the system to the Registrar control.
      void resetSchedule()
      Resets the logged in student's schedule by dropping them from every course and then resetting the schedule.

      • createRegistrar

        private void createRegistrar()
        Creates a new Registrar user based on field data from registrar.properties file

      • hashPW

        private java.lang.String hashPW(java.lang.String pw)
        Helper method to hash passwords for use in comparisons for login.
        Parameters:
        pw - The plain text password to hash
        Returns:
        Returns password hashed with SHA-256

      • getInstance

        public static RegistrationManager getInstance()
        Checks to see if single instance of RegistrationManager has been instantiated and then returns that instance
        Returns:
        Returns the static single instance of RegistrationManager

      • getCourseCatalog

        public CourseCatalog getCourseCatalog()
        Returns the courseCatalog Sorted List.
        Returns:
        Returns the courseCatalog object.

      • getStudentDirectory

        public StudentDirectory getStudentDirectory()
        Returns the studentDirectory Sorted List.
        Returns:
        Returns the studentDirectory object.

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String password)
        Checks that the given password matches the stored student password, or if the id is a Registrar id, that the given password matches the Registrar password.
        Parameters:
        id - The id to compare to records
        password - The password to compare to records
        Returns:
        Returns true if login is successful, false otherwise.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Ends the session of a Student logged in and returns the system to the Registrar control.

      • getCurrentUser

        public User getCurrentUser()
        Returns the User object that is currently logged into the system. This may be a Student or Registrar.
        Returns:
        Returns the User that is currently logged into the system.

      • clearData

        public void clearData()
        Resets both courseCatalog and studentDirectory to empty Sorted Lists and removes all data from them.

      • enrollStudentInCourse

        public boolean enrollStudentInCourse(Course c)
        Returns true if the logged in student can enroll in the given course.
        Parameters:
        c - Course to enroll in
        Returns:
        true if enrolled

      • dropStudentFromCourse

        public boolean dropStudentFromCourse(Course c)
        Returns true if the logged in student can drop the given course.
        Parameters:
        c - Course to drop
        Returns:
        true if dropped

      • resetSchedule

        public void resetSchedule()
        Resets the logged in student's schedule by dropping them from every course and then resetting the schedule.
